external_games.name: I Just Want to Be Single!!
I Just Want to be Single!!

name: I Just Want to Be Single!!
storyline: You are Aya - a timid, anxiety ridden mess that wants nothing more than to start fresh in your final year of high school. New school, new people, making friends will DEFINITELY work this time! But in a strange twist of fate, it turns out everyone in class fell in love with you instead?! How will you make new friends with cute girls that are looking for more than just friendship?
summary: I Just Want To Be Single!! is a visual novel dating simulation game where the twist is that you do not want to date the cast of eligible bachelorettes. In the game, you play as Aya, a socially awkward girl in her second year of high school, who only wants to make friends. Unfortunately, being a new transfer student starts turning heads and gets the attention of everyone in her class.
